name: GWatch
body:
# Installation

### 1. Download

Download GWatch's [latest release](https://github.com/gorzechowski/gwatch/releases/latest) for Your operating system, unpack and run.

### 2. Setup

Application initial view will be like this:

![gwatch](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4973929/17646250/400d0aba-61c2-11e6-846e-4317a82c4a03.png)

All You have to do is open menu by clicking top-left corner menu button and point to GWatchD's Websocket server:

![gwatch](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4973929/17646258/8b747a06-61c2-11e6-82df-73eb9d9040e2.png)

GWatch will automatically connect to server and You will see:

![gwatch](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4973929/17646255/695cfff6-61c2-11e6-9ab5-609063610284.png)

That's all, done!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
